project_descr: The main objective of the project is to enable the MLSG as a coordinator and monitor of the issues related to decentralization and local governance to further advance its efforts in promoting the citizen oriented local governance.

outputs.output_descr: MLSG  plans and coordinates the decentralization process in the country in a systematic, inclusive and transparent way, and innovative services for citizens are designed and tested utilizing regional and inter-municipal cooperation.
donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGO
